id: Muse helps William & Mary edge Maine 27-20
paragraph:
WILLIAMSBURG, Va. (AP) — Nick Muse caught eight passes for 107 yards and a touchdown and William & Mary beat Maine 27-20 on Saturday.The game was knotted at 17 after three quarters before Ted Hefter threw a 30-yard touchdown pass to Jalen Christian just seconds into the fourth and William & Mary (4-3, 3-1 Colonial Athletic Association) led the rest of the way.Hefter threw for 170 yards and Dean Rotger, who shared time behind center, threw for 65 yards and connected with Muse on a 5-yard score to tie the game at 7.Chris Ferguson led Maine (4-3, 3-1) with 278 passing yards but threw three interceptions, one of which was a 90-yard pick-6 by Arman Jones that gave the Tribe a 14-10 lead. The Black Bears owned time of possession and held the ball for 35 minutes and outgained the Tribe 347-268 in total yardage. But in addition to Ferguson’s interceptions, Maine incurred 13 penalties for 130 yards.Help | Press | Advertise With Us | Jobs | RSS | Site Map
